title: Unable to post on any other board...
body: I'm a newer player with a level 14 account, and I'd like to post a discussion in the Player Recruitment board, but it keeps saying I have to be level 7.... Not sure whats going on!

replies.body: Sometimes you just need a quick boards profile sync to get your levels updated correctly. Looks like posting this did the trick!
Seems like it! Thanks for the reply!

Hey there, if you go back into the Help and Support section there is a thread stickied to the top of the forum page which lets you update your profile to match your ingame level.

It can take about 15 minutes after you run the tool, but they you will be free to post on every other section of the forums.

Here is a direct link to that little nifty syncing tool. 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool
